Saturday, October 6, 2007 - Short Sale Workshop/Seminar - Click Here to sign up!

Board of Advisors Member Bert Cox of 1House.com

With the increasing number of foreclosures in Massachusetts and all over New England, short sale opportunities have never been greater.

With so many foreclosures out there and property values falling, many homeowners owe what their property is worth, or sometimes even more than it's worth. Many investors don't know what to do to help a motivated seller if there is no equity in the property. They either don?t know how to make it work or are unwilling to put forth the effort necessary to make the deal work. In situations like this, we SHORT SALE the mortgage. To short sale a mortgage means getting the lender to accept less than full payment of the mortgage.

Here's what you will learn to help you explode your investing opportunties!:

* Finding and qualifying sellers, and working with them through the processSi
* Protecting yourself through disclosures - don't run afoul of the new laws!
* Getting the deal to close (and getting paid!!!)
* The mechanics of the process - the nuts and bolts so you have the confidence to take action!
* Tricks of the Trade - little known secrets that make the difference
* Rules of thumb - so you don't waste time on deals that don't work
* Auction the property to find buyers fast - yes, you can do it yourself!

Boston REIA Members pay - $49.00
Visitors pay - $79.00
